p: Protein databank ( http://www.rcsb.org/) (Rose et al., 2016) was used for retrieval of 3CLpro (6LU7) crystal structure. Using the protein preparation implemented in Schrödinger software (Schrödinger, LLC, New York, NY), the structure was prepared and optimized. The OPLS_2005 force field was used for protein-energy minimization. For ligands preparation such as assigning appropriate ionization, stereochemistry, ring conformations, and tautomer (Release, 2017; Schrodinger, 2011), a LigPrep module was used. APBS tool (Lerner & Carlson, 2006) implemented in PyMOL was used for electrostatic potential calculation.
